title: Autonomous Province of Korçë
summary: The Autonomous Province of Korçë (Albanian: Krahina Autonome e Korçës), sometimes referred to as "The Autonomous Republic of Korçë", was an autonomous legal entity established in 27/10 December 1916, by the local French forces, after the city of Korçë fell under their control, during World War I and lasted till 1920.[3][4]
